REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0401 reute r f BC-YANKEE-<YNK>-SWAPS-ST 03-03 0048

TEXT.TITLE: YANKEE <YNK> SWAPS STOCK FOR DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Yankee Cos Inc said it has acquired 3,916,000 dlrs of 7-1/2 pct convertible subordinated debentures due May 15, 1998 of its YFC International Finance NV affiliate for 501,807 common shares from an institutional investor. Reuter
